list_definition.definition: a terrible event, especially one that causes great damage, loss etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The earthquake was the greatest disaster the country had ever experienced.

list_ex_of_english: A contemporary chronicler opined (in the annal for 1011) that 'all those disasters befell us through bad policy (unraeligdas)'.
